dmca.title: [ADMINS] Notice of Copyright referencehttp://www.thoiaotrang.com/diendan/index.php?sh
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ryan Carter [mailto:rcarter@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2006 6:49 AM
To: Legal
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] Notice of Copyright
referencehttp://www.thoiaotrang.com/diendan/index.php?showtopic=13529

 

 

 

________________________________

From: crs@spamcop.net
Sent: Mon 10/2/2006 9:09 PM
To: admins@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ADMINS] Notice of Copyright reference
http://www.thoiaotrang.com/diendan/index.php?showtopic=13529

> Sir, Madam,
> 
> The web master is bouncing and ignoring every copyright notice and
email sent,
> the domain managers are NOT resolving this despite the customer being
in clear
> breach of terms of their TOS. This is now into four weeks and a
criminal
> offence on both site owners and domain managers parts. If not resolved
and
> material removed criminal charges of fraud will be brought against
both.
> 
> 
> Notice of Copyright reference
> 
> 
> 
> Mr C R Slater
> C/O 49A City Road
> Newcastle upon Tyne
> NE12AQ England
> 07871430052
> 
> Sir, Madam,
> 
> I am the genuine true author/owner and copyright holder of the below
verse/poem
> illegally taken from my Greeting Card web site this has been stolen
despite
> notice clearly displayed registered copyright and not for reuse.
> 
> This material is now currently illegally displayed on your server
without any
> given author/owner consent. My Greeting Card sites have been online
since
1986.
> I write material to raise income for three registered UK charities
these
provide
> me with copyright on all my verses/poems works.
> 
> I swear on oath (also as a committed Christian) under penalty of
Federal and
> European prosecution for perjury that I am author and copyright holder
of the
> said material (displayed as below).
> 
> If a signed copy of this notice is required by your company I will
email one
> today as a PDF attachment for you to view and print.
> 
> /Christopher R Slater/
> Christopher R Slater
> ALL Rights Reserved
> 
> Poem displayed on your site clearly marked as on my own web site at
location(s)
> given below.
> 
> CRS (r)(c)2003
> All Rights Reserved
> 
> http://www.thoiaotrang.com/diendan/index.php?showtopic=13529
> 
> Someone to love me
> 
> I wish I were a cute teddy bear,
> On sale, in a teddy bear shop store,
> So some one would come and buy me,
> Hug me surely tightly, forever more.
> 
> I wish I were a beautiful sweet doll,
> On sale, in a toy doll shopping store,
> So some one would come and buy me,
> And love me, right down to the core.
> 
> I wish I were a little loveable puppy,
> On sale, in a really popular pet store,
> So some one would come and buy me,
> And pet me, when I offer them a paw.
> 
> I wish I were tiny cute sweet kitten,
> On sale, in a really popular pet store,
> So some one would come and buy me,
> Let me in, when I cried at their door.
> 
> I wish I were even treasured jewellery,
> On sale in a popular posh jewellers store,
> So some one would come in and buy me,
> And treasure me, it's what jewellery's for.
> 
> I wish someone would get the message,
> That I'm clearly writing out right here,
> I simply just want someone to love me,
> Someone to hold, and cherish me dear.
> 
> 
> Source: http://www.quickegreets.com/love/love57.htm
> 
> 
> http://www.quickegreets.com/love/love57.htm
> http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/love/love57.htm
> 
> http://www.thoiaotrang.com/diendan/index.php?showtopic=13529
> 
> Please Note
> 
> 1.) The material has been taken displayed illegally used without given
consent
> (data theft)
> 2.) Copyright and anti theft legal warnings have been deliberately
removed and
> ignored
> 3.) The data thief has falsified the author information on your site
> (plagiarism)
> 4.) My work has been left with out copyright warning and open to
further abuse
> on your server
> 5.) Your own company TOS (terms of service) have been breached
> 6.)As long as this material is displayed on servers without given
author
consent
> your company, any hosting servers are liable for a.) payment of
commission and
> royalties b.) soliciting traffic from unauthorised illegal display and
use to
> potentially gain interest to your service
> 
> If you search through Yahoo MSN or Google engines you will see this
has
clearly
> been taken from my own web via given URL's. Your users IP address
pages viewed
> were also logged by site logs and server server and your customers own
ISP
> servers too.our customers own ISP servers too.
 


--

10/2/2006
